tool.name: SetupBathyGrad

param.name: Workspace
param.dialogReference: Local folder workspace from which inputs are read and outputs are written.
param.pythonReference: Local folder workspace from which inputs are read and outputs are written.

param.name: SnapGrid
param.dialogReference: Raster grid that outputs are snapped to. This is often the projected DEM for the local folder.
param.pythonReference: Raster grid that outputs are snapped to. This is often the projected DEM for the local folder.

param.name: hucpoly
param.dialogReference: Local folder bounding polygon, often refered to hucpoly.
param.pythonReference: Local folder bounding polygon, often refered to hucpoly.

param.name: NHDArea
param.dialogReference: Double line streams from hydrography, often referred to as NHDArea.
param.pythonReference: Double line streams from hydrography, often referred to as NHDArea.

param.name: NHDFlowline
param.dialogReference: Single line flowline dendrite from hydrography, often referred to as NHDFlowline.
param.pythonReference: Single line flowline dendrite from hydrography, often referred to as NHDFlowline.

param.name: NHDWaterbody
param.dialogReference: Water body polygon features from hydrography, often referred to as NHDWaterbody.
param.pythonReference: Water body polygon features from hydrography, often referred to as NHDWaterbody.

param.name: cellSize
param.dialogReference: Output grid cell size, should be the same as the cell size of the snap grid.
param.pythonReference: Output grid cell size, should be the same as the cell size of the snap grid.

tool.summary: This script creates a set of NHD Hydrography Datasets, extracts the appropriate features and converts them to rasters for input into HydroDEM.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This script creates a set of NHD Hydrography Datasets, extracts the appropriate features and converts them to rasters for input into HydroDEM.
